data.lyric:
[ti:dorothea]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:evermore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]dorothea - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:02.83]Lyrics by：Aaron Dessner/Taylor Swift
[00:05.67]Composed by：Aaron Dessner/Taylor Swift
[00:08.50]Hey Dorothea do you ever stop and think about me
[00:13.33]
[00:14.37]When we were younger down in the park
[00:17.69]Honey making a lark of the misery
[00:21.16]
[00:24.25]You got shiny friends since you left town
[00:28.16]A tiny screen's the only place I see you now
[00:31.86]And I got nothing but well wishes for ya
[00:37.74]
[00:40.41]Oooh this place is the same as it ever was
[00:48.38]Oooh but you won't like it that way
[00:56.21]It's never too late to come back to my side
[01:00.19]The stars in your eyes shined brighter in Tupelo
[01:04.28]And if you're ever tired of being known for who you know
[01:08.33]You know that you'll always know me Dorothea
[01:16.07]Uh-uh
[01:16.86]
[01:19.73]Dorothea
[01:23.70]Ah-ah
[01:25.24]
[01:28.41]Ooh you're a queen sellin' dreams sellin' makeup in magazines
[01:36.48]Ooh from you I'd buy anything
[01:43.59]
[01:46.47]Hey Dorothea do you ever stop and think about me
[01:51.51]
[01:52.38]When it was calmer skipping the prom
[01:55.53]Just to piss off your mom and her pageant schemes
[01:59.67]
[02:02.21]And d**n Dorothea they all wanna be ya
[02:06.14]But are you still the same soul
[02:08.50]I met under the bleachers well
[02:10.50]Ooh I guess I'll never know
[02:17.58]
[02:18.29]Ooh and you'll go on with the show
[02:25.87]But it's never too late to come back to my side
[02:30.19]The stars in your eyes shined brighter in Tupelo
[02:34.32]And if you're ever tired of being known for who you know
[02:38.29]You know that you'll always know me Dorothea
[02:47.15]
[02:47.81]Uh-uh
[02:48.99]
[02:51.68]Dorothea
[02:55.07]
[02:55.68]Ah-ah
[02:58.72]
[02:59.80]Ooh ooh
[03:02.84]
[03:03.57]Ooh-woo-ooh-ooh-ooh ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh
[03:07.93]Ooh ooh
[03:10.76]
[03:11.68]Ooh-woo-ooh-ooh-ooh ooh-ooh-ooh
[03:14.94]
[03:16.00]Dorothea
[03:18.98]
[03:19.57]Ah-ah-ah
[03:22.67]
[03:23.85]Ah-ah
[03:24.94]
[03:32.76]Ooh
data.trans:
[ti:dorothea]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:evermore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.83]//
[00:05.66]//
[00:08.50]嘿 多萝西娅 你是否停下过脚步 思念起我
[00:13.33]
[00:14.37]年少之时 我们曾聚在公园
[00:17.69]一同在苦中作乐 亲爱的
[00:21.16]
[00:24.25]自你离开小镇后 你交了很多光鲜亮丽的朋友
[00:28.16]现在我要见你 只能通过那小小的屏幕
[00:31.86]我一无所有 但可以送给你真挚的祝福
[00:37.74]
[00:40.41]这片土地还与以往一样
[00:48.38]但一成不变不符合你的喜好
[00:56.21]无论何时 我的怀抱都会为你敞开
[01:00.19]在图贝洛市时的你 眼中的星光要更加闪亮
[01:04.28]若是你厌倦了试探摸索身边人的心思
[01:08.33]你知道 我的心门永远为你敞开 多萝西娅
[01:16.07]//
[01:16.86]
[01:19.73]多萝西娅
[01:23.70]//
[01:25.24]
[01:28.41]你是杂志上贩卖化妆品 贩卖梦想的女王
[01:36.48]因为是你 所以我都愿意买下
[01:43.59]
[01:46.47]嘿 多萝西娅 你是否停下过脚步 思念起我
[01:51.51]
[01:52.38]当风波过去 你逃过毕业舞会
[01:55.53]只为去骚扰你的妈妈 搞砸她的聚会计划
[01:59.67]
[02:02.21]多萝西娅 他们都把你当作偶像
[02:06.14]但你的灵魂是否从未改变
[02:08.50]与我在看台下遇见的那个一样
[02:10.50]我想我永远不会知道
[02:17.58]
[02:18.29]而你会继续维持你的人设表演
[02:25.87]但无论何时 我的怀抱都会为你敞开
[02:30.19]在图贝洛市时的你 眼中的星光要更加闪亮
[02:34.32]若是你厌倦了试探摸索身边人的心思
[02:38.29]你知道 我的心门永远为你敞开 多萝西娅
[02:47.15]
[02:47.81]//
[02:48.99]
[02:51.68]多萝西娅
[02:55.07]
[02:55.68]//
[02:58.72]
[02:59.80]//
[03:02.84]
[03:03.57]//
[03:07.93]//
[03:10.76]
[03:11.68]//
[03:14.94]
[03:16.00]多萝西娅
[03:18.98]
[03:19.57]//
[03:22.67]
[03:23.85]//
[03:24.94]
[03:32.76]//
